distribution_pattern: Products were sold directly to the consumers though our Whole Foods Market Retail stores in the state of Florida.
product_description: Gills Onions were used in this product.     The product listed below is prepared at Whole Foods Market and distributed in their retail chef's case or on the self-service bar. It was not sold labeled.    RANCH ICEBERG SALAD WEDGE NO OIL ADDED
reason_for_recall: Whole Foods Market in Florida recalled certain fresh food items sold in the prepared foods department and one item in the seafood department as they could of been made using raw yellow onions processed by Gill Onions, LLC. Gill Onions, LLC initiated a recall on their product due to possible Listeria monocytogenes contamination.
